name: Internal Terrors
description:
Internal Terrors is a short puzzle game based on managing sanity that takes place in a forest. 

Over time your sanity will gradually drain throughout the game. 

As your sanity changes, animals in the game will deform and change behaviors. Some of them might even trigger a panic attack and cause a game over if they get too close.

In order to gain back sanity, you can take small rests at benches to gain a clear mind. These benches will also be next to a light source, which all animals can never get close with.

Your overall goal is to collect 3 items from the forest to fix your car and escape.
